/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image appears to have been captured using a 360-degree camera, as indicated by the fisheye effect visible around the edges. This effect gives the image a sense of depth and immersion, as if the viewer is standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky.
